Appetizers.name: Hummus Platter
Appetizers.description: Creamy chickpea hummus served with warm pita bread and fresh vegetables.

Appetizers.name: Spanakopita
Appetizers.description: Crispy phyllo pastry filled with spinach and feta cheese.

Main Courses.name: Gyro Platter
Main Courses.description: Your choice of seasoned lamb or chicken, served with rice, Greek salad, and tzatziki sauce.

Main Courses.name: Falafel Wrap
Main Courses.description: Crispy falafel balls with lettuce, tomato, and tahini sauce wrapped in a warm pita.

Desserts.name: Baklava
Desserts.description: Rich, sweet pastry made of layers of phyllo filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey.
